title: Software Engineer
description:
At JFrog, we’re reinventing DevOps to help the world’s greatest companies innovate \\- and we want you along for the ride. This is a special place with a unique combination of brilliance, spirit and just all\\-around great people. Here, if you’re willing to do more, your career can take off. And since software plays a central role in everyone’s lives, you’ll be part of an important mission. Thousands of customers, including the majority of the Fortune 100, trust JFrog to manage, accelerate, and secure their software delivery from code to production \\- a concept we call “liquid software.” Wouldn't it be amazing if you could join us in our journey?
   

  

 We are looking for a strong, hands on, experienced developer who can join an innovative and talented R\\&D team. To join us you need to be able to think quickly, work fast and deliver high quality code, using the latest frameworks and technologies while having fun! this
   

  

**As a Software Engineer in JFrog you will...**
* Take part in all aspects of the development cycle.
* Write high quality, testable and efficient code.
* Support and Maintenance of the Production environment.
* Create back\\-end services and jobs
* Work closely with other geo\\-graphically located teams.
* Initiate and promote new ideas for continuous improvement of the product functionality.


**To be a Software Engineer in JFrog you need...**
* 2\\+ years of experience in Java Programming.
* Deep understanding of OOPS, Design Patterns.
* Knowledge and understanding of work in the modern CI environment: version control, build tool, CI server.
* Good exposure with modern DevOps tools like Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD.
* Knowledge of CS and software engineering concepts such as: concurrent programming, common data structures and algorithms, profiling and optimization.
* Disciplined approach to testing and quality assurance.
* Eager to learn more about new languages and frameworks.

title: AI Web Developer
description:
**Company Description**
  

 AuraDevops is a premier platform that simplifies development and deployment by leveraging cutting\\-edge AI solutions. The company provides insightful resources to enhance workflows and boost productivity for developers and organizations worldwide. AuraDevops is committed to innovation and efficiency, making it a trusted partner for modern technology solutions. By integrating AI\\-driven tools, the platform empowers developers to achieve seamless project execution and optimal results.
   

  

**Role Description**
  

 This is a full\\-time remote role for an AI Web Developer. The role involves designing, developing, and maintaining dynamic web applications utilizing AI and cutting\\-edge web technologies. Responsibilities include front\\-end and back\\-end development, programming, and integrating AI functionality into web solutions. Collaborating with cross\\-functional teams, the AI Web Developer will ensure seamless user experiences and effective application performance.
   

  

**Qualifications**
  

* Skills in Front\\-End Development and Web Design, including creating user\\-friendly interfaces and responsive designs
* Proficiency in Back\\-End Web Development and Programming to build robust and scalable applications
* Strong knowledge of Web Development principles and best practices
* Experience with AI integration or applications for enhanced web functionality
* Effective problem\\-solving and communication skills
* Ability to work independently in a remote environment
* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field
* Familiarity with cloud\\-based platforms and tools is an advantage

title: Software Developer 3
description:
**Job Description**
**JOB DESCRIPTION**
**Database Test and Tools Development team** 
 part of Server Technologies division plays a significant role in ensuring the highest quality and timely release of Oracle Autonomous Database.
   

  

 Database Test and Tools Development team is looking for bright and talented engineers from top\\-tier institutes to apply their ingenuity to test Oracle’s flagship product. It is an opportunity to demonstrate your skills as a Test Development Engineer for Oracle’s cloud\\-enabled platforms by developing cloud\\-enabled tests for various features in Database, Gen AI, Cloud services and Engineered systems.
   

  

**AI Vector Search in Oracle Database 23ai:** 
 Oracle AI Vector Search is a novel capability that allows users to search data based on the semantics or meaning of data, in addition to by the values of data, such as attribute values or keywords, as databases have traditionally supported.The feature allows you to generate, store, index, and query vector embeddings along with other business data, using the full power of SQL.
   

  

**Oracle Autonomous AI Lakehouse** 
 Enables Open, Interoperable Data Access Across Multi\\-Platform, Multicloud Environments
   

  

**Who do we need?**
 B.E/M.E/M.Tech./MS in Computer Science/IT/ECE/EEE from top\\-tier institutes
   

  

* 1 to 10 years of industry experience
* Development experience in C,C\\+\\+, Python or Java
* Solid Computer Science fundamentals (Data Structures and Algorithms, Programming, Designing solutions, solving complex problems, Operating Systems)


**Work with the latest technologies first\\-hand**
* Autonomous Database Cloud
* Generative Artificial Intelligence
* LLMs / RAG / AI Agents
* Vector Database
* Cloud Infrastructure
* In\\-Memory Database
* Big Data Analytics
* Distributed Database
* Data Warehouse/Data Lakehouse


**What do you gain?**
* Gain in\\-depth experience of various Database Cloud service offerings
* Expertise in Generative AI, LLMs, Vector Database, Similarity search
* Understand AI World: Retrieval Augmented Generation with Business Data
* Implement Intelligent test automation frameworks and tools
* Keep up the pace and work with Open Source Technologies and products
* Participate/Publish papers in various conferences
* Work with Stakeholders to come up with test strategies and applications for new and existing areas in\\-accordance with project timelines and leadership expectations.
* Debug and report test failures, help identify the root cause of failures whenever possible while performing highly complex analysis, which would generally include multiple distributed components.


**What are the challenges?**
 Need to understand the complex set of features of Oracle database which has a huge customer base.
   

  

* Need to simulate using small applications for most common customer scenarios within a short product development life cycle.
* Your contribution has a direct influence on the success of many high\\-end customers. Design, develop, troubleshoot and debug software programs for databases, applications, tools, networks etc.


 As a member of the software engineering division, you will assist in defining and developing software for tasks associated with the developing, debugging or designing of software applications or operating systems. Provide technical leadership to other software developers. Specify, design and implement modest changes to existing software architecture to meet changing needs.
   

  

 Duties and tasks are varied and complex needing independent judgment. Fully competent in own area of expertise. May have project lead role and or supervise lower level personnel. BS or MS degree or equivalent experience relevant to functional area. 4 years of software engineering or related experience.
   

  

 Life at Oracle and Equal Opportunity
   

  

 An Oracle career can span industries, roles, Countries and cultures, giving you the opportunity to flourish in new roles and innovate, while blending work life in. Oracle has thrived through 40\\+ years of change by innovating and operating with integrity while delivering for the top companies in almost every industry.
   

  

 In order to nurture the talent that makes this happen, we are committed to an inclusive culture that celebrates and values diverse insights and perspectives, a workforce that inspires thought leadership and innovation.
   

  

 Oracle offers a highly competitive suite of Employee Benefits designed on the principles of parity, consistency, and affordability. The overall package includes certain core elements such as Medical, Life Insurance, access to Retirement Planning, and much more. We also encourage our employees to engage in the culture of giving back to the communities where we live and do business.
   

  

 At Oracle, we believe that innovation starts with diversity and inclusion and to create the future we need talent from various backgrounds, perspectives, and abilities. We ensure that individuals with disabilities are provided reasonable accommodation to successfully participate in the job application, interview process, and in potential roles to perform crucial job functions.
   

  

 That’s why we’re committed to creating a workforce where all individuals can do their best work. It’s when everyone’s voice is heard and valued that we’re inspired to go beyond what’s been done before.
   

  

**Disclaimer:** 
 Oracle is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer\\*. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability and protected veterans’ status, or any other characteristic protected by law. Oracle will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records pursuant to applicable law.
   

  

* Which includes being a United States Affirmative Action Employer


 https://www.oracle.com/corporate/careers/diversity\\-inclusion/
   

  

 Career Level \\- IC3
   

  

**Qualifications**
 Career Level \\- IC3
   

  

**About Us**
 As a world leader in cloud solutions, Oracle uses tomorrow’s technology to tackle today’s challenges. We’ve partnered with industry\\-leaders in almost every sector—and continue to thrive after 40\\+ years of change by operating with integrity.
   

  

 We know that true innovation starts when everyone is empowered to contribute. That’s why we’re committed to growing an inclusive workforce that promotes opportunities for all.
   

  

 Oracle careers open the door to global opportunities where work\\-life balance flourishes. We offer competitive benefits based on parity and consistency and support our people with flexible medical, life insurance, and retirement options. We also encourage employees to give back to their communities through our volunteer programs.
   

  

 We’re committed to including people with disabilities at all stages of the employment process. If you require accessibility assistance or accommodation for a disability at any point, let us know by emailing accommodation\\-request\\_mb@oracle.com or by calling \\+1 888 404 2494 in the United States.

All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability and protected veterans’ status, or any other characteristic protected by law. Oracle will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records pursuant to applicable law.

title: Test Automation Engineer
description:
Job Summary:Skilled Test Automation Engineer with hands\\-on experience in JavaScript, TypeScript, and Playwright to design, automate, execute, and maintain high\\-quality automated test suites. You will play a key role in ensuring product quality across web and mobile platforms, working closely with developers, QA analysts, and DevOps engineers in an agile environment.Key Responsibilities:
   

  

* Design and develop automated test scripts using Playwright with JavaScript/TypeScript.
* Maintain and enhance automation frameworks and CI/CD test pipelines.
* Execute automated test cases and analyze results to ensure software quality.
* Collaborate with developers, product owners, and QA teams to understand requirements and identify test coverage needs.
* Debug failures, analyze root causes, and raise defects with clear documentation.
* Integrate automated tests with build and release pipelines (e.g., GitHub Actions, Azure DevOps, Jenkins).
* Contribute to continuous improvement of testing processes and standards.
* Maintain test data and ensure repeatable test runs across environments.Required Skills \\& Experience:a) 3\\+ years of experience in test automation for web applications.b) Strong programming skills in JavaScript or TypeScript.c) Hands\\-on experience with Playwright for end\\-to\\-end automation.d) Strong debugging and problem\\-solving skills.3 must haves

title: Software Developer - GenAI
description:
**Who We Are**
 At Kyndryl, we design, build, manage and modernize the mission\\-critical technology systems that the world depends on every day. So why work at Kyndryl? We are always moving forward – always pushing ourselves to go further in our efforts to build a more equitable, inclusive world for our employees, our customers and our communities.
   

  

**The Role**
 Are you passionate about solving complex problems? Do you thrive in a fast\\-paced environment? Then there’s a good chance you will love being a part of our Software Engineering – Development team at Kyndryl, where you will be able to see the immediate value of your work.
   

  

 As a Software Engineering \\- AI Developer at Kyndryl, you will be at the forefront of designing, developing, and implementing cutting\\-edge software solutions. Your work will play a critical role in our business offering, your code will deliver value to our customers faster than ever before, and your attention to detail and commitment to quality will be critical in ensuring the success of our products.
   

  

 In this role, you will play a key role in the development and implementation of GenAI solutions, leveraging your technical expertise.
   

  

 Candidate is expected to have a good understanding of AI technologies and experience in designing and implementing cutting\\-edge AI systems. Additionally, expertise in data engineering, DevOps, and MLOps practices will be valuable in this role.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Development and deploy of Generative AI and LLM projects, ensuring alignment with business objectives.
* Participate in the development of gen AI solutions, AI Agent development and Elastic ML deliverables
* Design and deploy Proof of Concepts (POCs) and Points of View (POVs) across various industry verticals, demonstrating the potential of Generative AI applications


**Who You Are**
 You’re good at what you do and possess the required experience to prove it. However, equally as important – you have a growth mindset; keen to drive your own personal and professional development. You are customer\\-focused – someone who prioritizes customer success in their work. And finally, you’re open and borderless – naturally inclusive in how you work with others.
   

  

**MUST HAVE**
* Graduate / Postgraduate in computer science or computer engineering or equivalent with 2\\-4 years of experience in the IT Industry.
* Strong expertise in software development using python
* Good understanding of Transformers, LLMs, Fine Tuning, Agentic AI and RAG techniques.
* Comfortable with development of AI Agents
* Experience in AI/ML, with a focus on Generative AI and Large Language Models.


**Being You**
 Diversity is a whole lot more than what we look like or where we come from, it’s how we think and who we are. We welcome people of all cultures, backgrounds, and experiences. But we’re not doing it single\\-handily: Our Kyndryl Inclusion Networks are only one of many ways we create a workplace where all Kyndryls can find and provide support and advice. This dedication to welcoming everyone into our company means that Kyndryl gives you – and everyone next to you – the ability to bring your whole self to work, individually and collectively, and support the activation of our equitable culture. That’s the Kyndryl Way.
   

  

**What You Can Expect**
 With state\\-of\\-the\\-art resources and Fortune 100 clients, every day is an opportunity to innovate, build new capabilities, new relationships, new processes, and new value. Kyndryl cares about your well\\-being and prides itself on offering benefits that give you choice, reflect the diversity of our employees and support you and your family through the moments that matter – wherever you are in your life journey. Our employee learning programs give you access to the best learning in the industry to receive certifications, including Microsoft, Google, Amazon, Skillsoft, and many more. Through our company\\-wide volunteering and giving platform, you can donate, start fundraisers, volunteer, and search over 2 million non\\-profit organizations. At Kyndryl, we invest heavily in you, we want you to succeed so that together, we will all succeed.
   

  

**Get Referred!**
 If you know someone that works at Kyndryl, when asked ‘How Did You Hear About Us’ during the application process, select ‘Employee Referral’ and enter your contact's Kyndryl email address.

title: SDET : Mobile
description:
**About Aspora**
 People on the move deserve a bank that moves with them. Since 2022, Aspora has been building a borderless financial operating system that makes money as mobile and transparent as its users.
   

  

 Backed by influential venture capitalists like Sequoia Capital, Greylock Partners, Hummingbird Ventures, Y Combinator \\& Global Founders Capital. We're a team of 75\\+ across India, the UK, the UAE, EU and the US, working with extreme ownership, radical candour, and an obsession with customer impact.
   

  

 We celebrate builders who question assumptions, ship fast, and turn regulatory complexity into elegant solutions. If you’re driven to redefine what global banking can be, we’d love to build the future with you.
   

  

**About The Role**
 As a Mobile SDET at Aspora, you’ll own the quality strategy, automation systems, and testing foundations that power our Android, iOS, and web products. You won’t just write test cases, you’ll define how we test, build resilient automation frameworks, and ensure every release is reliable at scale. You will work closely with engineering, product, and design to ship high\\-quality features with confidence in a fast\\-paced startup environment.
   

  

**Location:** 
 Bangalore \\|\\| In Office
   

  

**What You’ll Own**
* Architect and implement mobile automation frameworks across Android, iOS, and web using Appium, Espresso, XCUITest, Cypress or Playwright.
* Build modular, scalable test systems integrated into CI/CD pipelines (GitHub Actions) to ensure fast, reliable automation cycles.
* Own release readiness, including validation pipelines for feature flags, staged rollouts, and A/B experiments.
* Validate internal and third\\-party SDK integrations across environments (staging, production) ensuring data flow and compatibility.
* Ensure APK/IPA integrity including signing, artifacts, and version consistency.
* Debug flows and inspect traffic using Charles Proxy, ADB, Pluto, and similar diagnostic tools.
* Monitor and triage issues using Firebase Crashlytics, Sentry, driving root\\-cause resolution with dev teams.
* Use AI\\-led test tools to improve coverage, auto\\-generate scenarios, and enable self\\-healing test suites.
* Continuously improve release quality through better observability, automation coverage, and process refinement.


**What We Need**
* 4–7 years of experience as a Mobile SDET/SDET with deep experience in mobile automation.
* Strong command of Java with sound understanding of OOP principles and clean coding standards.
* Proven hands\\-on experience using Appium, XCUITest, Espresso, Cypress/Playwright, and integrating frameworks into CI/CD.
* Strong debugging ability using tools like Charles Proxy, Pluto, and ADB utilities.
* Experience testing mobile\\-specific flows: feature flags, push notifications, deep links, A/B tests, beta releases.
* Familiarity with crash monitoring tools like Firebase Crashlytics or Sentry.
* Experience building or contributing to API/backend automation using Postman, REST Assured, or similar.
* Strong ownership mindset with ability to independently drive quality outcomes in cross\\-functional environments.


**Who You Are**
* You take end\\-to\\-end responsibility for product quality and don’t wait to be told what to test.
* You enjoy building frameworks as much as writing test cases.
* You thrive in environments where speed and accuracy must coexist.
* You communicate clearly, debug deeply, and solve for the customer first.
* You constantly ask: “How can this be automated or made more reliable over time?”


**Bonus Points**
* Experience working in a fast\\-paced fintech startup.
* Exposure to AI\\-driven testing platforms or self\\-healing automation.
* Contributions to open\\-source testing frameworks.
* Experience working in feature\\-rich apps with high transaction volume.


**Why Join Aspora?**
* Build quality systems for a global fintech redefining banking for immigrants.
* Own a critical part of the product pipeline where your work directly impacts user trust.
* Be part of an early team where execution speed, ownership, and innovation are valued.
* Work closely with exceptional engineers and product leaders.
* Competitive salary \\+ ESOPs aligned with our long\\-term mission.
* Grow rapidly as we scale across India, UAE, UK, US, and beyond.

title: Interface Developer
description:
Our team members are at the heart of everything we do. At Cencora, we are united in our responsibility to create healthier futures, and every person here is essential to us being able to deliver on that purpose. If you want to make a difference at the center of health, come join our innovative company and help us improve the lives of people and animals everywhere. Apply today!
   

  

**Job Details**
**Job Summary**
 As a Interface Developer ,you will play a critical role in ensuring the smooth and efficient operation of an organization's B2B ecommerce platform. The analyst will troubleshoot issues, optimize processes, test new functionalities, and provide ongoing support to maintain a high\\-performing and customer\\-centric B2B online store.
   

  

**Shift : 12:00 PM to 09:00 PM**
**Key Responsibilities**
* Design, develop and configure components in support of interface requirements.
* Background in Integration development using Adeptia or SAP PI or Mulesoft or Dell Boomi, IBM Sterling Connect development
* Ability to move cross platform to new integration technologies and platforms within the organization such as Adeptia Connect
* Perform performance analysis and tuning for individual interfaces.
* Ensure interface connectivity is configured between Adeptia and SAP and legacy systems.
* Provide on\\-going support and maintenance of the Adeptia components and interfaces with SAP PI etc.
* Assist business teams with creation of integration test cases and plans. Support project teams during testing.
* Promote component reuse strategy across all development environments.
* Provide technical quality assurance.
* Ensure that development efforts adhere to analysis, design and development standards.
* Manage day\\-to\\-day issues and tasks related to the development and support of Adeptia interfaces.
* Build and manage workflows, business processes, and data flows to enable seamless system integrations.
* Develop APIs and connectors to integrate external and internal systems.
* Create data mappings and transformations using XML, JSON, XSLT, CSV, and flat\\-file formats.
* Ensure the accuracy of data exchange and transformation between systems.


**Required Qualifications**
* Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Information Technology, or a related field.
* Proven experience of at least 7\\-8 plus years in development and support in any of the technologies like Adeptia or SAP PI or MuleSoft or Dell Boomi, IBM sterling connect.
* Hands\\-on experience with the above platforms for integration development.
* Strong knowledge of integration technologies, including APIs, REST, SOAP, and EDI.
* Proficiency in data mapping and transformation using technologies like XML, JSON, and XSLT.
* Familiarity with database systems (e.g., SQL, MySQL, Oracle) and scripting languages (e.g., JavaScript, Python, or Java).
* Use of Languages like Java or Python and Data mapping \\& data transformation
* Good to have Exposure to SAP components .


**Preferred Qualifications**
**Minimum 7\\-8 \\+ years experience in design, development and support of Adeptia components and interfaces, including development and Adeptia or SAP PI or MuleSoft or Dell boomi, IBM sterling connect.**
**Experience On Linux**
**Preferred Background – Java ,Python, Data mapping, data transformation**
**Working knowledge of SAP PI message mapping techniques.**
**Experience \\& Educational Requirements**
 Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology or any other related discipline or equivalent related experience. 4\\+ years of directly\\-related or relevant experience, preferably in software designing and development.
   

  

**Preferred Certifications**
 Android Development Certification

 Application/Infrastructure/Enterprise Architect Training and Certification, e.g. TOGAF

**Technical Skills**

 Microsoft Office Suite
   

  

 NoSQL Database Platforms like MongoDB, BigTable, Redis, RavenDB Cassandra, HBase, Neo4j, and CouchDB
   

  

 Programming Languages like JavaScript, HTML/CSS, Python, SQL

title: Custom Software Engineer
description:
**Project Role :**

title: Engineer III - Software Engineering (IN)
description:
Our team members are at the heart of everything we do. At Cencora, we are united in our responsibility to create healthier futures, and every person here is essential to us being able to deliver on that purpose. If you want to make a difference at the center of health, come join our innovative company and help us improve the lives of people and animals everywhere. Apply today!
   

  

**Job Details**
**Primary Duties \\& Responsibilities**
* Designs, implements, unit tests, documents and deploys applications and APIs based on functional requirements
* Designs and develops database applications using SQL Server Integration Services, TSQL and Stored Procedures
* Consults with the business to determine logical design for new business solutions according to existing data architecture
* Performs code reviews, analyze execution plans, and re\\-factor inefficient code
* Provides technical support \\& guidance to Software Engineers I/II in development of desired software/applications
* Follows data standards, resolves data issues, completes unit testing and completes system documentation for ETL processes
* Assists Managers with project development, including documentation of features, recording of progress, and creation of the testing plan
* Collaborates with business analysts, source system experts, and other team members to determine data extraction and transformation requirements
* Collaborates with IT operations and testing organizations to ensure timely releases of projects and database environments are sustainable
* Supports IT staff and business users in the development, usage and troubleshooting of database\\-driven applications
* Creates detailed designs, performs analyses, creates prototypes, and documents completed design
* Acts as a senior member of the team; represents the organization on project teams and may perform technical project leadership roles while fostering teamwork and collaboration within and across work groups
* Intermediates knowledge on client requests, features, best practices, project scopes, and budgets
* Contributes to the growth of the company by advancing personal skills, working with the development team to improve the codebase, and seeking opportunities to improve the company’s tools and processes
* Designs, develops, and automates scalable data engineering solutions by leveraging cloud infrastructure
* Extends or migrate existing data pipelines to new cloud environment
* Crafts data models of program processes and data entities and develops technical design \\& documentation of solutions
* Participates in optimization of data asset performance
* Transfers knowledge of data access/consumption mechanisms to business stakeholders, data visualization specialists and/or data scientists
* Develops solutions and recommendations for improving data integrity issues


**What Your Background Should Look Like (minimum Qualifications)**
 Bachelor's degree or related experience and 8\\+ years of development experience. Requires some training in fields such as business administration, accountancy, sales, marketing, computer sciences, or similar vocations, generally obtained through completion of a four\\-year bachelor’s degree program, technical vocational training, or equivalent combination of experience and education.
   

  

* 5\\+ years of professional experience in designing, developing, and maintaining Java applications, with a strong understanding of core Java concepts, data structures, and algorithms.
* 3\\+ years of React or Angular, Typescript, JavaScript, Node.js, HTML 5, CSS, and Bootstrap preferred.
* Proven experience in designing, developing, and deploying scalable and resilient microservices\\-based applications.
* In\\-depth knowledge and hands\\-on experience with either Spring Boot or Quarkus for building enterprise\\-level, cloud\\-native Java applications and RESTful APIs.
* Solid understanding of RESTful API design principles and experience in building and consuming RESTful web services. Familiarity with tools like Swagger/OpenAPI is a plus.
* Experience working with SQL (e.g.,MySQL, Oracle) databases, including data modeling and query optimization.
* Proficiency with Git for version control and experience with CI/CD pipelines and tools (e.g., Jenkins, Azure Repos, Azure Pipelines).
* Strong understanding of software testing principles and experience with unit testing (e.g., JUnit, Mockito), integration testing.
* Familiarity with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure) and containerization technologies like Docker and orchestration tools like Kubernetes is desirable.
* Excellent analytical and problem\\-solving abilities, with strong communication and collaboration skills to work effectively within an agile team environment.
* Good interpersonal skills
* Ability to prioritize workload and consistently meet deadlines.
* Ability to use good judgment in conveying project status and problem escalation.


**Experience \\& Educational Requirements**
 Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology or any other related discipline or equivalent related experience. 4\\+ years of directly\\-related or relevant experience, preferably in software designing and development.
   

  

**Preferred Certifications**
 Android Development Certification
   

  

 Microsoft Asp.Net Certification
   

  

 Microsoft Certified Engineer
   

  

 Application/Infrastructure/Enterprise Architect Training and Certification, e.g. TOGAF
   

  

 Certified Scrum Master
   

  

 SAFe Agile Certification
   

  

 DevOps Certifications like AWS Certified DevOps Engineer
   

  

**Skills \\& Knowledge**
 Behavioral Skills:
   

  

 Critical Thinking
   

  

 Detail Oriented
   

  

 Impact and Influencing
   

  

 Interpersonal Communication
   

  

 Multitasking
   

  

 Problem Solving
   

  

 Time Management
   

  

**Technical Skills**
 API Design
   

  

 Cloud Computing Methodologies
   

  

 Integration Testing \\& Validation
   

  

 Programming/Coding
   

  

 Database Management
   

  

 Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC)
   

  

 Technical Documentation
   

  

 Web Application Infrastructure
   

  

 Web Development Frameworks
   

  

**Tools Knowledge**
 Cloud Computing Tools like AWS, Azure, Google cloud
   

  

 Container Management and Orchestration Tools
   

  

 Big Data Frameworks like Hadoop
   

  

 Java Frameworks like JDBC, Spring, ORM Solutions, JPA, JEE, JMS, Gradle, Object Oriented Design
   

  

 Microsoft Office Suite
   

  

 NoSQL Database Platforms like MongoDB, BigTable, Redis, RavenDB Cassandra, HBase, Neo4j, and CouchDB
   

  

 Programming Languages like JavaScript, HTML/CSS, Python, SQL
   

  

 Operating Systems \\& Servers like Windows, Linux, Citrix, IBM, Oracle, SQL
   

  

******What Cencora offers******
 Benefit offerings outside the US may vary by country and will be aligned to local market practice. The eligibility and effective date may differ for some benefits and for team members covered under collective bargaining agreements.
   

  

 Full time
   

  

******Affiliated Companies******
 Affiliated Companies: CENCORA BUSINESS SERVICES INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED
   

  

********Equal Employment Opportunity********
 Cencora is committed to providing equal employment opportunity without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, genetic information, national origin, age, disability, veteran status or membership in any other class protected by federal, state or local law.
   

  

 The company’s continued success depends on the full and effective utilization of qualified individuals. Therefore, harassment is prohibited and all matters related to recruiting, training, compensation, benefits, promotions and transfers comply with equal opportunity principles and are non\\-discriminatory.
   

  

 Cencora is committed to providing reasonable accommodations to individuals with disabilities during the employment process which are consistent with legal requirements. If you wish to request an accommodation while seeking employment, please call 888\\.692\\.2272 or email hrsc@cencora.com. We will make accommodation determinations on a request\\-by\\-request basis. Messages and emails regarding anything other than accommodations requests will not be returned

title: Custom Software Engineer
description:
**Project Role :** 
 Custom Software Engineer
   

  

**Project Role Description :** 
 Develop custom software solutions to design, code, and enhance components across systems or applications. Use modern frameworks and agile practices to deliver scalable, high\\-performing solutions tailored to specific business needs.
   

  

**Must have skills :** 
 SAP Monitoring \\& Tools
   

  

**Good to have skills :** 
 NA
   

  

**Minimum 3 Year(s) Of Experience Is Required**
**Educational Qualification :** 
 15 years full time education
   

  

 Summary: As an Application Designer, you will assist in defining requirements and designing applications to meet business process and application requirements. A typical day involves collaborating with various stakeholders to gather insights, analyzing user needs, and translating them into functional specifications. You will engage in discussions with team members to ensure alignment on project goals and contribute to the overall design and functionality of applications, ensuring they meet the highest standards of quality and usability. Roles \\& Responsibilities:
   

  

* Implementing \\& Supporting Change \\& Release management related customization along with Retrofit.
* Setting up \\& troubleshooting monitoring related scenarios for the supported systems
* Guiding stakeholders with consulting experience both in SOLMAN \\& CALM related functionalities
* Supporting landscape management \\& transport management related activities
* Collaboration/co\\-ordination with stake holders/different teams using SOLMAN/CALM.
* Active contribution to development of the knowledge base
* Escalation points for all technical issues
* Technical cutover, Go\\-live support, hyper care and handover.
* Adhering to timelines and KPIs defined as part of the agreement.
* Preparing and continuously updating user training documentation, how to guides, handbooks and other relevant materials to support end user enablement
* Resolving and/or supporting in solving incidents/service requests and problems and technical issues
* Technical support in development of Proof of Concepts and Prototyping.
* Proactive identification and communication of technical issues requiring further investigation and analysis by the respective support teams
* Continuous improvement of the system and processes
* Execute the functional activities related to SAP Solution manager system SPS upgrade including but not limited to : Planning, Solman Setup Screening, Bug fixes, minor enhancements, Formal testing, change management, this would be run in all systems in landscape including sandboxes
* Execute screenings, dry run tests, formal tests on ALM related enhancements and bug fixes
* Perform extensive screening, detailed testing for SolMan Upgrades (yearly) Professional \\& Technical Skills: \\* Must To Have Skills: Proficiency in SAP Monitoring \\& Tools.
* At least 6\\+ years of hands\\-on experience in SAP Solution Manager Consulting with ChaRM, Focused Build \\& Focused Run. Cloud ALM exposure is preferable.
* Hands on experience with SAP Solution manager modules of Project \\& Process management, Change \\& Release Management, Focused Build, Test management \\& Analytics, Technical monitoring, Business process monitoring, Interface monitoring, job monitoring \\& Basic system setup activities.
* Good to have exposure in integration of third\\-party tools like Jira, SNOW with SOLMAN/CALM .
* Experience in working in a regulated environment
* Strong interpersonal skills; ability to work well on cross\\-functional project teams and foster team commitment to tasks
* Strong verbal and written communications skills, with an ability to express complex business concepts in technical terms.
* Strong analytical, problem solving, and conceptual skills
* Must be self motivated, results\\-oriented and have a track record of timely, high\\-quality deliverables
* Strong written and oral communication skills in English Additional Information: \\- The candidate should have minimum 4 years of experience in SAP Monitoring \\& Tools. \\- This position is based at our Bengaluru office. \\- A 15 years full time education is required., 15 years full time education

description:

 Custom Software Engineer

 Develop custom software solutions to design, code, and enhance components across systems or applications. Use modern frameworks and agile practices to deliver scalable, high\\-performing solutions tailored to specific business needs.

 NA

 Roles and responsibilities:
   

  

* Collaborate with project teams and client stakeholders to support project delivery.
* Perform maintenance and configuration activities for Kronos modules such as accruals and timekeeper.
* Prior experience in supporting functional testing, integration testing and UAT preferred.
